name: Cellular Protection
description:
Protect the cell from all kinds of diseases. Shoot antibodies against evil viruses and bacteria. 

One gun firing antibodies is good, but two make you stronger together. Combining two guns in a game gives you a stronger weapon that allows scoring more points

Tip: Use the arrow or A and D keys to rotate multiple guns at the same time

Credits:

Code: NickKeys, Geek_Joystick

Art: Johnny Jacques

Audio: Mike Konoval
